Lemon Grass essential oil is used in aromatherapy and offers a variety of benefits. Lemongrass oil is extracted by steam distillation from the fresh or partly dried leaves. Lemongrass oil has a lemony, sweet smell and watery viscosity. Lemongrass essential oil blends well with basil, cedar wood, coriander and geranium, jasmine, lavender and tea tree oils.
